properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.discovery.enabled
properties.description: Flag to indicate that discovery is enabled.

properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.discovery.heartbeat-frequency
properties.description:
Frequency in milliseconds of poll for heart beat. The client will poll on this
 frequency and broadcast a list of service ids.

properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.discovery.org
properties.description: Organization name to authenticate with (default to user's default).

properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.discovery.password
properties.description: Password for user to authenticate and obtain token.

properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.discovery.space
properties.description: Space name to authenticate with (default to user's default).

properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.discovery.url
properties.description: URL of Cloud Foundry API (Cloud Controller).

properties.name: spring.cloud.cloudfoundry.discovery.username
properties.description: Username to authenticate (usually an email address).
